                int flags,
                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> pairs,
                boolean closeCurrentContext,
                java.lang.Class<?> activity)
        Purpose - Launch an activity
        Parameters:
        packageContext - - Current context
        flags - - Intent flags to launch with the activity
        pairs - - parameters to the activity as a Bundle
        closeCurrentContext - - whether or not to close the current activity\service
        activity - - Activity to launch

      • turnScreenOn

        Purpose - Force screen to turn on if the phone is asleep.
        Parameters:

      • getExtraObject

        Used to get the parameter values passed into Activity via a Bundle.
        Parameters:
        context - The current Context or Activity from which this method is called
        key - Extra key name.

        Purpose - Before trigerring an implicit intent check if there is any registered activity

        context - Current Activity context
        intent - Implicit Intent to be called
